snippet.title: Go Fight Fantastic - Official Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show 2023
snippet.description:
Take a look at gameplay in this new trailer for Go Fight Fantastic, an upcoming 1-3 player hack n’ slash game coming to Steam in 2023. A demo for the game is available now on Steam. Go Fight Fantastic stars a crew of interstellar smugglers, led by their space-dog captain Bowie. When they stumble into an invasion during a mission to Bird Planet, they become the only hope of this once-peaceful world.

#SummerOfGaming
